input.sentences: halloween at [male] 's was actually kind of scary . like [male] dressed up as the burger [male] ... with a chainsaw .
then [male] and [male] dressed up as ... actually no one knew what [male] and [male] were dressed up as .
[male] swore he was supposed to be hellboy . but no one was actually buying it .
and [male] was supposed to be a priest of some kind or another . we rejected the idea of `` pimp priest '' and he seemed kind of hurt .
[female] and [female] came as the unlikely pair of a succubus and a pirate wench . but at least everyone had fun .
output.sentences: At a Halloween party, a man came dressed as a king, but was carrying a chain saw.
Other party goers, also in costume, were not terribly afraid of him.
But there was one man, dressed in devil horns, who was a little worried about what the king's intentions were.
His friend, dressed like a pimp/priest, assured him that it was all in good fun.
Then two ladies approached the man, one a pirate, the other a succubus, and offered him a drink.
